name: Hallvarsson & Halvarsson
overview:
Business concept:Hallvarsson & Halvarsson offers Sweden’s largest combined expertise in trust building corporate communications. We have a complete set of services in financial communication, corporate communication, corporate marketing and public affairs. This holistic approach gives us the resources to handle virtually all types of demanding and complex assignments concerning your company’s communication with various audiences.Hallvarsson & Halvarsson works closely with our clients to develop and sharpen the messages and focus on the channels that have the highest impact, whether it’s media, print, digital or personal meetings. It’s about penetrating the noise, creating insight, touching and, above all, creating value. We build the kind of trust that gives your company a better business performance. H&H quick facts:

  • Founded 1995
  • Strategic communications consulting and operative support to boards, executive teams and communication officers
  • Approximately 70 employees with broad and deep competences
  • Broad client portfolio – both small and large companies and organizations where communication is of strategic significance
  • 1/3 of revenues from foreign clients
  • Close cooperation with sister agency KW Digital
  • Part of King Worldwide, a global communications group

relationships.title: Executive Partner, Head of Business Area Digital Communications
